eng: than; as; _marks amount or degree_ {RELATIVE:the amount that|INTERROGATIVE:how much}
to; by; _marks theme, stimulus, or recipient_ {RELATIVE:whom (relative)}

at; on; in; _marks time_ {RELATIVE:when (relative)|INTERROGATIVE:when (interrogative)|INDETERMINATE:one day; sometime; at some point|DETERMINATE:then|PROXIMAL:now|VERB:be at; coincide; OBJ {event} happens at the same time as IND {time of occurence}}

on; at; in; _marks location_ {RELATIVE:where (relative)|INTERROGATIVE:where (interrogative)|INDETERMINATE:somewhere|DETERMINATE:there|PROXIMAL:here|VERB:be present; attend; be around; be strong; be; OBJ {presence} is present at IND}

because; since; _marks cause_ {RELATIVE:why (relative); because of which|INTERROGATIVE:why (interrogative)|INDETERMINATE:for some reason|DETERMINATE:therefore; for that reason|PROXIMAL:herefore; because of this|VERB:result; follow; bear responsibility; bear fault; OBJ {effect} results from IND}

by; with; through; _marks instrument_ {RELATIVE:with which (relative)|INTERROGATIVE:with what (interrogative)|INDETERMINATE:with something; somehow|DETERMINATE:with that; thus|PROXIMAL:with this; like so|VERB:use; work through; OBJ {user} is using IND}
if; for; _marks hypothetical world_ {RELATIVE:for which|INTERROGATIVE:under what condition; when (interrogative)|INDETERMINATE:in some event|DETERMINATE:in that event|PROXIMAL:given this}
by; as; via; _marks method or manner_ {RELATIVE:how (relative); by which|INTERROGATIVE:how (interrogative)|INDETERMINATE:somehow|DETERMINATE:thus; thereby|PROXIMAL:like so; hereby}
